}} 'Downstream' is a 2010 post-apocalyptic film that takes place in a near-
future dystopia where gasoline is scarce and a drifter tries to reach a rumored
utopian city, Plutopia, [http://www.hollywoodgothique.com/2010/02/los-angeles-premiere-
of-downstream/ Los Angeles Premiere of Downstream], Steve Biodrowski, 10
February 2010, Hollywood Gothique (retrieved 6 September 2010) powered by
clean energy. [http://www.sfbg.com/listing/2010/02/23/our-weekly-picks Our
weekly picks], Cheryl Eddy, [[San Francisco Bay Guardian]], 23 February 2010
(retrieved 6 September 2010) The film is directed by Simone Bartesaghi and
co-directed, written, and produced by Philip Y. Kim. Official website
